RelatedSentence: The travel volume - which would be about 0.6 percent higher than the Memorial Day weekend a year ago in the state - is due to an improved economy and more people wanting to get out of town after the long , cold winter , AAA said .

The travel volume - which would be about 0.6 percent higher than the Memorial Day weekend a year ago in the state - is due to an improved economy and more people wanting to get out of town after the long , cold winter , AAA said .
About 90 percent of Ohioans traveling , or about 1.2 million , are expected to drive to their destinations .

As the economy continues to improve at a slow and steady pace , consumer spending , disposable income , consumer confidence and the employment outlook are trending up , which is welcome news for the travel industry , AAA chief operating officer said Marshall L. Doney said in a statement .
AAA expects 36.1 Americans to travel during the holiday period , an increase of 1.5 percent from 2013 .
Memorial Day typically kicks off the summer travel season .
AAA said popular travel destinations for Ohioans include Myrtle Beach and Hilton Head in South Carolina ; Orlando , Florida ; and Nashville , Tennessee .
